messages.subject: Re: new  virus detected
messages.msgSnippet: hi mate, it is on the main page Microsoft downloads, that would be rough if they were shipping there own virus LOL, Bill has blown a valve if that s the case.
messages.messageBody:
hi mate, it is on the main page Microsoft downloads, that would be rough if they were shipping there own virus LOL, Bill has blown a valve if that's the case. I hadn't heard that story, they are running a story on the news at the moment about it.

Rich





Rich,
is it true the nasty is waiting for whoever go to Microsoft download center ( when you go to dl the patch, you catch the virus )?

Milt

messages.subject: new  virus detected
messages.msgSnippet: Hi all, this is nasty, take a look all PC Windows users, a virus that doesn t need email.
messages.messageBody:
Hi all, this is nasty, take a look all PC Windows users, a virus that doesn't need email.

http://www.microsoft.com/technet/treeview/default.asp?url=/technet/security/bulletin/MS03-026.asp

Rich T
